transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Good morning sir. Kaise hai sir aap? Kaise hai sir aap?
Customer: Badhiya hai. Ha badhiya hai.
Executive: Ji sir aapki na baat hui hogi kal Suryansh sir se. Actually aapne na WhatsApp pe kuch images kari thi share. To aapne kaha tha wo remove karne ke liye.
Customer: Par wo wo wo purchasing ke liye humne kiya tha seed ke product ko. Seedo beej ke liye beej ka hame purchasing karna tha loose mein.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Okay. To wo kharidne ke liye hum kar rahe the lekin wo aapne selling mein dikha diya.
Executive: Ji sir actually aapne WhatsApp kara hua tha usme se kuch bhi mention nahi tha ki isko add karna hai nahi karna hai. Maine aapko call bhi karne ka try kiya tha na. To aap shayad busy the shayad. To mere ko laga aapka catalog.
Customer: Madam kuch humne jo jo jo RND base vegetable seed ke product hame chahiye the unke liye kuch loose ke companiyon ke contact number de do hame.
Executive: Ji sir wo Suryansh sir hai na. Hai na? Unse aap hui hogi us related baat. To wo hum karwa denge lekin sir aapka aapke na catalog pe work hone wala hai. To wo schedule.
Customer: Madam 1:00 baje ke 1:00 baje ke something aapko call karke hum karte hain.
Executive: Accha thik hai. And sir iska kya price rehta hai ye? Sir maine aapko na remove hataya tha aapka ye jo product hai na Saraswati abotram melon seeds ka.
Customer: Ha.
Customer: Ha iska kya price rehta hai sir?
Customer: Ye 35 ₹3500 50 gram ke seed ka price hai. ₹3500 ₹4000.
Executive: Ek second sir maine isko edit kar diya.
Customer: ₹3500 ₹4000 ke seed ka price hai ye 50 gram ka packet aata hai iska hai.
Executive: 50 gram ka na. Accha thik hai. Sir ye pata kya hua tha sir aapne na ye add kar rakha tha. To isme na option aa rahi thi ₹3500 per kg ke. To unhone IndiaMART walon ne kya kiya tha na jo hamara catalog department rehta hai uski taraf taraf se na wo product na reject ho jata hai. Kyunki wo market standard se karta nahi match. Abhi maine agar gram ke hisab se isko add kar rahi hu to main dekhti hu abhi wo ho gaya hai.
Customer: To hame ₹3500 per kilo ka rate pada hua tha lekin wo uska packing 50 gram ka hi aata hai ₹3500 se ₹4000 ka per packet ke hisab se rate padta hai uske.
Executive: Okay. To ye 3500 50 gram ke hisab se maine likh diya hai isko thik hai. Description mein aise main add kar dungi. Sir baki fir aapke us din mein. Hello?
Customer: Ji madam.
Executive: Ji sir aapne na wo jo purchasing ke liye requirement kari hui thi usme ek to wo snap ki cucumber ki green chillies wale seeds ki. To wo fir na maine inactive kar diya tha. Agar aap apne account pe jaake dekhenge to aapke catalog mein abhi na wo show nahi hoga. Hai na?
Customer: Thik hai madam. Fir hum aapse baat karte hain.
Executive: Fir kab schedule karu main aapki video call ek minute.
Customer: 1:00 baje madam.
Executive: Accha thik hai. Main aapko call karungi to utha lijiyega thik hai?
Customer: Ha ha bilkul madam 1:00 baje aaj hum free hi rahenge aapko ye kaam karana hai. Kyunki schedule time aa raha hai.
Executive: Ji ji bilkul sir kabhi ye hai na ki aapka bhi ho jayega kaam hai na. To aapke conversion mein bhi problem nahi aayegi. Aise kya hai na ki agar aapka catalog hi thik nahi hoga to aapko requirement kahan se aayegi. Agar hum bhi aapko share karte hain leads to aapke product ke hisab se karenge na. Lekin ye hai ki agar jo catalog update nahi hoga to usme problem kya aayegi na ki agar koi bhi buyer aapke product ko agar kisi bhi area mein karta hai search to kai baar kya hota hai aapke paas.
Customer: Madam madam 1:00 baje thik kara lenge sab kuch.
Executive: Accha thik hai thik hai.
Customer: Abhi hame thoda time do aap.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's images were added under selling.

- Wants contact numbers of loose seed companies.

- Catalog shows incorrect price per KG.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed catalog work is in progress.

- Executive will schedule a video call at 1 PM.

- Executive edited the price to per gram.

- Executive made cucumber seeds inactive.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call at 1 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, seeds, price, purchasing
